buy(uint256).details: Sender buys tokens to be paid from his wallet and sent to his wallet.

params.weiAmount: amount of tokens to be bought with min unit of quote token Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

buyFor(address,uint256).details: Sender buys tokens to be sent to another wallet.

params.weiAmount: amount of tokens to be bought with min unit of quote token Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

params._minTokenBuyAmount: min allowed buy Initializes: - Ownable: setting owner to the deployer - Pausable: initial setting to not paused Requires: - Both token and quote ERC20s to have 18 decimals
params._price: price in wei for a unit (ether)
params._wallet: wallet holding the tokens to sell, must approve this contract to move the funds

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

remainingTokens().details: Checks the amount of tokens left in the allowance.

returns._0: Amount of tokens left in the allowance

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._price: new Price in wei Requirements: - Only Owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
